name: Stroop's Effect
description:
It's my first game and i hope you like it. This game was made for a Community Game Jam. So Stroop Effect is a delay in the reaction time of a task occurs due to a mismatch in stimuli. In this game you need to go to the right portal to complete the level, but obstacles are on the way and you need to avoid them to get closer to the portals. After all of the obstacles you will be given a correct color of a portal but written by color of the incorrect portal, and that's how your brain and the game trying to trick you. 

Music written by: Банда Гиньолей.
